title.narrative: Communication inter-sectorielle pour le developpement

description.narrative: More than 3,000,000 individuals received positive message on good practices for child survival and development, strategic communication plans related to immunization against COVID-19 and to support the myriad of complex emergencies faced by the country in 2021. Implementation partners capacities in communication techniques and participatory community-based approach were reinforced. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:24/01/2022
